name: Oprichniki Medic

investigation.name: Fatui Oprichnik
investigation.description: A soldier encased within a Fatui war machine.\nUnlike their Skirmisher cousins, soldiers of the Oprichniki are formally recruited and rigorously trained. They are deployed either to the Fatui's most critical strongholds or thrown into the deadliest frontline battles.

description: A soldier of the Fatui Oprichniki, equipped with a staff-like device and tasked with providing emergency medical support to their comrades in arms.\nIn truth, these medics have largely only taken crash-course training, and as such, their healing abilities are limited. In practice, they tend to adopt more efficient methods of supporting their allies â€” mixing in with the different units and charging at the enemy lines.
